lines.text: This is a '70s porno. You know how I can tell? Because the guy's dick has sideburns.
Sir, have you had anything to drink today?

[drunk]
I had about a half a beer, the dog had a lot.
Wow, Awesome! They got porno!
See that, your head hurts 'cus you feel guilty.
My head hurts 'cus you shot me in it!
You wank off a lot?
What's a lot?
You know, you got 5 minutes off, slip into one of the rooms, pull down your lil' panty's wack it.
I saved our fuckin' life!
I don't like your God. Your God scares me.
I see you've got porno here
Yes, we have an excellent selection
Good I like the porn
Well, good

[Trying to escape out of the window in the shower, Keats puts his gun in his ass]
AAAAAAAAGGGGGGHHHHH!
Let me guess. You dropped the soap!
Please take that thing out of my ass.

[Charlie, the motel manager looks up and sees them]
I want you on the bed. Now.
You'd better not kill me, man, I've got shit to do tomorrow!
You can't stop fucking me over, can you?
In actuality, I was hitting on her harder than you think, motherfucker! So why don't you step the fuck back before I bitch slap your fucking heiney!
Jack, Colton made me do it. He would've killed me if I hadn't done it...
Ooh, watch it now, Keats, l she's playin' you.
But then I fell in love with you.
But... then I fell... shut the fuck up!
I swear to God I did!
Ah, she's lyin' out her devil ass!
Will you shut the fuck up?
Why don't you make me?
[she knocks the gun out of his hand and punches him, sending him down the stairs]
Jesus... I gotta learn how to fight; this is pathetic.
Hey, Man! What are you doing? You just wasted good weed!

[singing]
And I will always love you...
WILL YOU SHUT UP? SHUT THE HELL UP!
I got piss on me!
You're a piece of shit, you know that, Keats?
